name: RoombaGame.Alpha2
description:
A Rogue Like where you explore my house, as a roomba! Use dust as currency, and be sure to recharge your Roomba!

 This game is VERY unfinished, with minimal features to make it playable. Expect more features, enemies, weapons, items, levels, skins, songs, and more. I will update with more content regularly, but for now, enjoy Alpha.2! 

Please feel free to give feedback on the game! This is my first time releasing one, and right now you might be able to help out the game with your creativity and knowledge. So help out if you can!
